title: Biotech entrepreneurs grab $49M to bankroll a neuroscience startup
author: John Carroll
description: A little more than two years ago, Jazz Pharmaceuticals stepped up with a $397 million deal for an experimental narcolepsy drug from tiny Aerial BioPharma. | Jazz, which markets Xyrem for narcolepsy, led a $49 million round to launch Arrivo BioVentures.
